00037 class KMCSingle : public KMCCalculator 
00038 {
00039 public:
00040     KMCSingle() {};
00041    ~KMCSingle() {};
00042 
00043     void Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options );
00044     bool EvaluateFrame();
00045 
00046 protected:
00047             void LoadGraph();
00048             void RunKMC(void);
00049             void WriteOcc(void);
00050 
00051             map<int , node_t *> _nodes_lookup;
00052             vector<node_t *> _nodes;
00053             map<int , node_t *> _injection_lookup;
00054             vector<node_t *> _injection;
00055             string _injection_name;
00056             double _runtime;
00057             double _dt;
00058             int _seed;
00059             string _filename; // HACK
00060             
00061 };
00062 
00063 void KMCSingle::Initialize(const char *filename, Property *options )
00064 {
00065         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.runtime")) {
00066             _runtime = options->get("options.kmcsingle.runtime").as<double>();
00067         }
00068         else {
00069             throw invalid_argument("Error in kmcsingle: total run time is not provided");
00070         }
00071 
00072         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.outputtime")) {
00073             _dt = options->get("options.kmcsingle.outputtime").as<double>();
00074         }
00075         else {
00076             throw invalid_argument("Error in kmcsingle: output frequency is not provided");
00077         }
00078 
00079         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.seed")) {
00080             _seed = options->get("options.kmcsingle.seed").as<int>();
00081         }
00082         else {
00083             throw invalid_argument("Error in kmcsingle: seed is not provided");
00084         }
00085         
00086         if (options->exists("options.kmcsingle.injection")) {
00087             _injection_name = options->get("options.kmcsingle.injection").as<string>();
00088         }
00089         else {
00090             throw invalid_argument("Error in kmcsingle: injection pattern is not provided");
00091         }
00092         
00093         _filename = filename;
00094 
00095        //cout << _seed << endl;
00096        srand(_seed);
00097        votca::tools::Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00098 
00099 }
00100 
00101 bool KMCSingle::EvaluateFrame()
00102 {
00103 
00104     LoadGraph();
00105     RunKMC();
00106     return true;
00107 }
00108 
00109 void KMCSingle::LoadGraph() {
00110 
00111     Database db;
00112     db.Open( _filename );
00113     cout << " Loading graph from " << _filename << endl;
00114     Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT id, name FROM segments;");
00115 
00116     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00117         int id = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00118         string name = stmt->Column<string>(1);
00119         node_t *n =new node_t(id);
00120         _nodes.push_back(n);
00121         _nodes_lookup[id] = _nodes.back();
00122         if (wildcmp(_injection_name.c_str(), name.c_str())) {
00123             _injection.push_back(n);
00124             _injection_lookup[id] = _injection.back();
00125         }
00126     }
00127     //delete stmt;
00128     cout << "  -Nodes: " << _nodes.size() << endl;
00129     cout << "seed:" << _seed << endl;
00130     if(_seed > _nodes.size()){ throw invalid_argument ("Seed is bigger than number of nodes. Please specify a smaller seed in your input file."); }
00131     cout << "  -Injection Points: " << _injection.size() << endl;
00132 
00133     delete stmt;
00134 
00135     int links = 0;
00136     stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT seg1, seg2, rate12e, rate21e, drX, drY, drZ FROM pairs;"); // electron rates, check (think about) this
00137     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00138         node_t *n1 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(0)];
00139         node_t *n2 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(1)];
00140         double rate12 = stmt->Column<double>(2);
00141         double rate21 = stmt->Column<double>(3);
00142         vec r = vec(stmt->Column<double>(4), stmt->Column<double>(5), stmt->Column<double>(6));
00143         n1->AddEvent(new link_t(n2, rate12, r));
00144         n2->AddEvent(new link_t(n1, rate21, -r));
00145         links += 2;
00146         
00147         if ( votca::tools::globals::verbose ) {
00148             cout << "rate12=" << rate12 << endl;
00149             cout << "rate21=" << rate21 << endl;
00150             cout << "r=" << r << endl;
00151         }
00152     }
00153     delete stmt;
00154     cout << "  -Links: " << links << endl;
00155 
00156 }
00157 
00158 void KMCSingle::RunKMC(void)
00159 {
00160 
00161         double t = 0;
00162 
00163         srand(_seed);
00164         votca::tools::Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00165 
00166         // cout << " seed:size:site " << _seed << ":" << _injection.size() << ":" << Random::rand_uniform_int(_injection.size()) << endl;
00167         current=_injection[Random::rand_uniform_int(_injection.size())];
00168         cout <<" Starting simulation at node: "<<current->_id-1<<endl;
00169         double next_output = _dt;
00170     int i=0;
00171     while(t<_runtime) {
00172         t+=current->WaitingTime();
00173                 current->onExecute(); // this line causes a Segmentation fault
00174         if(t > next_output) {
00175                 next_output = t + _dt;
00176                 cout << t << ": " << r << endl;
00177         }
00178     }
00179     _runtime = t;
00180     WriteOcc();
00181     cout << std::scientific << "\nKMC run finished\nAverage velocity (m/s): " << r/t*1e-9 << endl;
00182 }
00183 
00184 void KMCSingle::WriteOcc()
00185 {
00186     Database db;
00187     cout << "Opening for writing " << _filename << endl;
00188         db.Open(_filename);
00189         db.Exec("BEGIN;");
00190         Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("UPDATE segments SET occPe = ? WHERE id = ?;");  // electron occ. prob., check (think about) this
00191         for(int i=0; i<_nodes.size(); ++i) {
00192                 stmt->Reset();
00193                 stmt->Bind(1, "0.8");
00194                 stmt->Bind(2, _nodes[i]->_id);
00195                 stmt->Step();
00196         }
00197         db.Exec("END;");
00198         delete stmt;
00199 }
